Posts.Content: twnkltoz God bless you and thanks so much for your comment. I have TNBC and I although I believe I will beat it, I still am nervous about the Chemo that is upcoming next week. This has been a shocking, uphill battle and the positivity and encouragement helps out so much because it's hard for others to understand what one with Cancer feels unless they themselves have had it. Again, thank you so much. I really appreciate it!
Posts.Title: Triple Negative - No Chemo????
